markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hydraulic Maneuvers](/Feats.aspx?ID=2310) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings. If the next action you take is an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), that action has a range of 15 feet. You don't receive any item bonuses to that check or any circumstance bonuses related to your physical body, but if you roll a critical failure on that Athletics check, you get a failure instead.
name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
